sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"使困惑，迷惑，糊涂，伤脑筋"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: puzzle, bewilder, confuse, embarrass, perplex, baffle, confound, distract
means: puzzle ： 侧重使人难于理解、困惑、伤脑筋。
bewilder ： 语气强烈，指因迷不解或惊愕而慌乱，不知所措，无法清醒地思考。
confuse ： 语气较弱，指由于混淆、混乱而糊涂。
embarrass ： 常指因处境或困难问题而感到窘迫、局促不安或焦急而不知所措。
perplex ： 除困惑外，还含焦虑或缺乏把握之意，因而难于作出决定，无从下手处理。
baffle ： 语气最强，多指遇见奇怪情景或复杂困难情况时所产生的惶恐困惑心理。
confound ： 常指人惊慌失措和狼狈不堪。
distract ： 主要用于注意力分散、思想矛盾或过分激动时产生的昏乱。

sentence.Network_en: The choice of Governor may confound us all.
sentence.Network_cn: 州长的选择可能会让我们所有人感到困惑。

sentence.Network_en: Don't confound the means with the ends.
sentence.Network_cn: 不要使手段与目的混淆不清.

sentence.Network_en: Are you going to lie there all day , confound it, you sow! "

PerfectNetExp.abs: 字根字尾构词法.doc - 豆丁网 ... conform 使顺应,使一致 confound 使惶恐,使混淆 confuse 使混乱.
一起学英语 - Let’s Learn English ... 4. Vowels( 元音） confound 挫败，使落空 mercenary 外国雇佣兵.
l 混淆(Confounding)的意义为，直交表中某两行的交互影响与其他行的效应是相同的，例如L8(27)的第1行与第2行的交互影响与第3行 …
taunt的翻译查词例句词组大耳朵英语 ... sullage 残渣, 淤泥, 污水 ... confound 使混淆, 使狼狈, 挫败... soutache 饰带.

list.abs: 因此，这个变项便称为混淆变项（confounding variable）。 心理学的演进 ˙自我内省科学心理学之父Wilhelm Wundt（冯特）将内省  …
混淆变量(Confounding Variable)是指与自变量和因变量均相关的变量，该变量使自变量和因变量间产生虚假的关系(Meinert, 1986)。
partial carry 部分进位partial confounding 部分混区partial correlation 偏相关

然而,当把很多所说的的“混合因素”(confounding factor),譬如怙恃受教诲程度、移平易近配景等加以思量然后,现实上在双语环境中成长起来的小儿童其实不看出来进修.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French confondre, from Latin confundere 'pour together, mix up'. Compare with confuse

entry.def: If someone or something confounds you, they make you feel surprised or confused, often by showing you that your opinions or expectations of them were wrong.

example.ex: He momentarily confounded his critics by his cool handling of the hostage crisis...
example.tran: 他对人质危机的冷静处理一时让批评者们惊讶不已。

example.ex: The choice of Governor may confound us all.
example.tran: 州长的选择可能会让我们所有人感到困惑。

means.word_mean: 1. be confusing or perplexing to; cause to be unable to think clearly;

sentences.sentence: "you are confusing me with the other candidate"

auth_sentence.content: Everywhere else, though, Twin Sister confound expectations.
auth_sentence.res_content: Everywhere else, though, Twin Sister confound expectations.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Everywhere else, though, Twin Sister confound expectations.

auth_sentence.content: In other words, will they confound the stereotypes?
auth_sentence.res_content: In other words, will they confound the stereotypes?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In other words, will they confound the stereotypes?

auth_sentence.content: It is a category error to confound them.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is a category error to confound them.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is a category error to confound them.

sentences.en: The extraordinary election results confounded the government.
sentences.cn: 这次不寻常的选举结果使得政府不知所措。
